attributes.action: double the Council Tax on ALL second homes (whether residential or for investment).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To provide an equitable approach to assist first time buyers & those at the lower end of the property market.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Second-Homes/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
